=================================================

Simon Schama explores the story of the Jewish experience from ancient times to the present day


1/5 Simon Schama begins his exploration of the Jewish story at the start, 3,000 years ago. alongside millions of people.

2/5 How medieval Jews struggled to preserve their identity under Christian and Islamic rule.

3/5 How the enlightment allowed Jews to integrate into modern European culture and

4/5 How the Jewish people of Eastern Europe made their mark on the modern world.

5/5 How the Holocaust and the creation of Israel have changed what it means to be Jewish.
